scrollfiend.name: Doomscoller
scrollfiend.description: Feeds on social media browsing. Heals when you visit Facebook, Instagram, X, TikTok, and other social media sites.

tubewyrm.name: Tubewyrm
tubewyrm.description: Thrives on video content. Heals when you visit YouTube, Twitch, Netflix, and other streaming sites.

tabberwock.name: Tabberwock
tabberwock.description: Masters chaos through tab switching. Heals whenever you switch between tabs.
